snippet: President Donald Trump toured a private religious school in Florida on Friday, praising it as an ideal institution for "disadvantaged children" while re-emphasizing that his education agenda will focus on school choice....

headline.main: UN Security Council Begins Africa Trip Focused on Boko Haram
headline.print_headline: UN Security Council Begins Africa Trip Focused on Boko Haram

lead_paragraph: President Donald Trump toured a private religious school in Florida on Friday, praising it as an ideal institution for "disadvantaged children" while re-emphasizing that his education agenda will focus on school choice.
